alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Waller and northwestern Harris Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cypress, or 10 miles north of Katy. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hockley, Waller and Cypress. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Brief heavy downpours were also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized urban or poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
